Title: Trump’s tariffs are officially in effect, including 104 percent on China
Description:
President Donald Trump’s promised higher tariffs have gone into effect today, targeting many countries whose goods imported to the US were already subject to a 10 percent base tariff that started on April 5th.

Title: JWST Spots Giant Spiral Galaxy Shockingly Early in Cosmic History

Title: If Bacterial Vaginosis Acts like an STI, Should It Be Treated like One?
Description:
Bacterial vaginosis is an irritating overgrowth of pathogenic bacteria.
A new study has found that some cases of the condition should be treated like a sexually transmitted infection.

Title: Why People Feel More Energized with Less Sleep
Description: People on TikTok and other social media say they feel more alert when they have had fewer hours of sleep—but sleep scientists warn this is a false sense of energy
